page.title: 18FOOD IN BALMEDIE
page.content: There are many places where we get our food in Balmedie. There is a butcher and he sells mince, steak, stew, lamb, bacon,pork,and sausages. He gets his supplies from E.C.Mathiesons. There is also a place called the Coach and Horses, it is over 100 years old and it has always been an Inn. The owner Mr Cook sells drinks and bar lunches. We can also have a meal at the White Horse Inn. There is a chip shop in Balmedie which provides a selection of meals. Balmedie post office also sells a large variety of different types of food. If I was having a treat this is what I would have. Breakfast Frosties with milk. Lunch Mince and tatties. Dinner Sausage beans and chips followed by Angel Delight. Sometimes we go out for a meal and have something unusual like sweet and sour pork.
